page.title: 06Holy Trinity Church
page.content: The village of Gedney Hill grew up in the 1200's.The history book says the first church was built in 1375.In the late 14th century they discovered the remains of two door-ways and an East window.In the church there is a nave, chancel,vestry,South porch and a tower that is 52 feet high.In the church there are eight wooden posts supporting the nave arcades.The posts have limestone bases.If you look at the church you can see that it's in the shape of a cross. There are five bells in Gedney Hill church and the members of the church are trying to raise money for another bell. There is a Baptist Chapel in Gedney Hill that is dated 1883.It has a service once a month.
